sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./current-weather.css"; const CurrentWeather = ({ data }) => { if (!data || !data.weather || !data.weather[0]) { return null; // Add a check to handle cases where data is missing or incomplete } return (

{data.city}

{data.weather[0].description}

{data.weather[0].icon && ( )}

{Math.round(data.main.temp / 12)}°C

Details
Feels like {Math.round(data.main.feels_like / 12)}°C
Wind {data.wind.speed} m/s
Humidity {data.main.humidity}%
Pressure {data.main.pressure} hPa
); }; export default CurrentWeather;
